bibl.title: Bala'izah: Coptic texts from Deir el-Bala'izah in Upper Egypt
bibl.note: Textes grecs, en part. dans le vol. II.
bibl.seg: Kahle Paul E., Bala'izah. Coptic Texts from Deir el-Bala'izah in Upper Egypt. Vol. I; - Vol. II.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 1954, 8°, xxi-pp. 1-486 et pll. I-III; - pp. 487-890 et pll. IV-V.
Textes grecs, en part. dans le vol. II.

C.R. par Alexander Böhlig, BibO 14 (1957) pp. 72-74. - P. Devos, AnalBoll 74 (1956) pp. 256-259. - William F. Edgerton, JNES 15 (1956) pp. 58-64. - J.H. Kuhn, JThS N.S., 6 (1955) pp. 306-310. - J.P. Smith, Biblica 37 (1956) pp. 119-122. - Joseph Vergote, ChrEg 30 (1955) No. 59, pp. 173-176.
